relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
The campus is very secure and safe. People are always on patrol.
There are may different fraternities and sororities.
There are a lot of clubs to get involved in. Same a sororities, fraternities, and intramurals.
It is expensive but it fits well being a state school. You get your moneys worth.
There are lots of events happening in dorms and in the Rec center. Lots of stuff to do. Go for walks along the river, check out the bookstore, or go out to eat at local restaurants.
The food is really good. They have a great variety.
It is very clean and the people are very nice.
There are a lot of professors that will help you and make you better in your major.
Lock Haven University has the education that I need to get my degree. The environment is great and beautiful. It is a real change but a good one.
pageTitle: Lock Haven University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Jamie from Kane, PA 07/16/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 3 of 50 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Lock Haven University is great for anybody who is used to a small town lifestyle and smaller class sizes. Tips for prospective students Dont' let the bland website fool you! Lock Haven is really an exciting place full of great, small-town people and a high quality education. Bang for the buck I can honestly say that Lock Haven University, being one of the Pennsylvania State Schools, is one of the cheapest institutions in Pennsylvania that offers a high quality education that will help its students compete in the job market. Am enjoying being here It being summer, I cannot wait until I return for the fall. The friends I have met there
